pullRequest.title: Upgrade JAX-RS / MP Rest Client CXF bundles to 3.4.1 Snapshot
pullRequest.bodyText: In preparation for MP Rest Client 2.0, this PR pulls in the latest snapshot of Apache CXF 3.4.1 - it also removes several overlay files that are no longer needed since the changes in them have been contributed back to the CXF community.

nodes.bodyText: is this going to affect any customers who might be setting this property? Or do we not expose this property and we're fine to just use CXF's property?

we should always specify EXACT on the versions to avoid potential "soft matching" artifacts in Artifactory. I've had to sort out those issues before where a new artifact gets uploaded and for some reason it starts matching to the wrong version.

nodes.bodyText: leads me to believe we don't need EXACT on the others for now? not sure. Enjoy the spam.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,49 @@
+#*******************************************************************************
+# Copyright (c) 2020 IBM Corporation and others.
+# All rights reserved. This program and the accompanying materials
+# are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1.0
+# which accompanies this distribution, and is available at
+# http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html
+#
+# Contributors:
+# IBM Corporation - initial API and implementation
+#*******************************************************************************
+-include= ~../cnf/resources/bnd/bundle.props
+bVersion=1.0
+
+
+Bundle-SymbolicName: io.openliberty.org.eclipse.microprofile.rest.client.2.0; singleton:=true
+
+Export-Package: \
+  org.eclipse.microprofile.rest.client;version=1.4,\
+  org.eclipse.microprofile.rest.client.annotation;version=1.1,\
+  org.eclipse.microprofile.rest.client.ext;version=1.2,\
+  org.eclipse.microprofile.rest.client.inject;version=1.2.1,\
+  org.eclipse.microprofile.rest.client.spi;version=1.1.1
+
+Import-Package: \
+	javax.annotation;version='[1.3,2)',\
+	javax.enterprise.context;version='[2.0,2.1)',\
+	javax.enterprise.inject;version='[2.0,2.1)',\
+	javax.enterprise.util;version='[2.0,2.1)',\
+	javax.inject;version='[2.0,2.1)',\
+	javax.ws.rs.core;version='[2.1,3)',\
+	org.eclipse.microprofile.rest.client;version='[2.0,2.1)',\
+	org.eclipse.microprofile.rest.client.spi;version='[2.0,2.1)',\
+	*
+
+Include-Resource: \
+  @${repo;org.eclipse.microprofile.rest.client:microprofile-rest-client-api;2.0}
+# TODO: when replacing 2.0-RC2 with 2.0, make sure to add EXACT:

afterCommit.message: Review comments and tweak to fix client failures

nodes.bodyText: I would recommend including "ibm" or similar in the snapshot version to make it clear we built it e.g. org.apache.cxf:cxf-rt-transports-http:3.4.1-ibm20201002. The wiki for this goes a step further and suggests changing the group id to com.ibm.ws.org.apache.cxf ... I think that is overkill.

Review comments and tweak to fix client failures
